    • Constructor Detail

      • Weapon

        public Weapon(int pow,
              int hit,
              int weaponRange,
              int buyPrice,
              java.lang.String weaponName)
        Weapon to be used by the player and enemies
        Parameters:
        pow - - attack power of weapon
        hit - - base hit rate of weapon
        weaponRange - - range of weapon, usually one or two at most
        buyPrice - - how much the weapon costs in the shop
        weaponName - - Name of weapon
